LanguageData.VVE_HandbrakeWarning: {VEHICLE_nameDef} will not have enough room to decelerate and will need to use the handbrake. This will cause damage to the tires.
LanguageData.VVE_OpenDescription: Designate the garage door to be opened.
LanguageData.VVE_CloseDescription: Designate the garage door to be closed.
